EmailTemplate.name: MBO Call Summary (1355521747.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Call Summary (1355521747.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Mike, It was a pleasure speaking with you. I’m glad to hear you would like to get your account setup and ready to go for your next project. Here are a few important items: - You can access a private informational section about MBO Partners here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> (please bookmark this page.) - Benefits (401k, Health, Dental, etc) - Sample Contracts - Demo of our Business Center - Value of MBO
- In addition, we have an index of recorded Webinars, white papers and collaterals that talk about the best practices for working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
